problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, the two edges of ∠AOB and are tangent to ⊙C respectively, and the OA edge and ⊙C are tangent to the vertex P. If ∠AOB = N_0, OP = N_1, then the length of OC is ()
raw_answer: 解:连接CP,∵OA边与⊙C相切于点P,∴CP⊥AO,∵⊙C与∠AOB的两边分别相切,∠AOB=90°,∴∠POC=45°,∴OP=CP=6,∴OC=√{CP^{2}+0P^{2}}=6√{2},故选:C．
raw_comment: 本题考查了切线的性质定理、切线长定理以及勾股定理的运用,能够正确的判定△POC是等腰直角三角形是解题关键．
